mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Concerns a letter that Jefferson hopes to receive from Mr. Blake; forgot to ask William Short about it in an earlier letter; requested letter written by Bernard Carter; letter published by the archbishop of Mexico, Zoledo, and mentioned in 3rd Burgoyne's Travels 303; wants William Short to send the letter by Blake; the price will be added to the first investment made by his brother here.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, n.d., n.p. to [William Short], n.p.
